definition: sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: Sigmoid and transverse colon was the common site of perforation.
sentences.chinese: 穿孔部位常见于乙状结肠和横结肠。

sentences.english: Simple right sigmoid colon needn t to manage.
sentences.chinese: 单纯右位乙状结肠本身不需处理。

sentences.english: For 15 patients with unresectable lesions, colostomy of transverse colon or sigmoid colon was performed.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤无法切除行乙状结肠或横结肠造瘘15例。

sentences.english: Sigmoid tumor associated with acute ileus could be treated with stage I colectomy.
sentences.chinese: 乙状结肠肿瘤并急性肠梗阻可行I期结肠切除吻合术。

sentences.english: The ulcerations worsen and the woman eventually underwent a loop sigmoid colostomy.
sentences.chinese: 溃疡恶化，最终该女患经受了乙状结肠袢式造口术。

sentences.english: We performed complete wedge resection of the diverticulum and primary closure of the sigmoid colon.
sentences.chinese: 我们作憩室之楔状切除后，其乙状结肠作直接逢合。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of orthotopic sigmoid colon neobladder with low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原位低压乙状结肠膀胱术的疗效。

sentences.english: The left kidney was multicystic dysplastic. The sigmoid colon was extremely distended.
sentences.chinese: 左肾为多囊肾和发育不良，乙状结肠极度扩张。

sentences.english: Dislodging entrapped fecal matter above the sigmoid colon area.
sentences.chinese: 取出包埋粪便以上乙状结肠区。

sentences.english: Pathological examination of the bladder revealed bladder abscess and the sigmoid colon showed diverticulitis .
sentences.chinese: 组织病理检查证实有乙状结肠憩室并引起膀胱脓肿。

definition: transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
descending colon (anatomy)/third section of large intestine
jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])
iliac fossa (anatomy)/pelvic basin internal to ilium
